channel.title: Code Golf Website
channel.description:
Here's a competitive code golf site with a leaderboard:
https://code.golf/
The site seems to be reasonably well done, puzzles look good:
https://code.golf/qr-decoder#c
It has a different model than other sites, where the answers are secret:
> *"Can I See Other People's Solutions?* > > *No, that way all holes stay competitive. If you're stuck on how to shave a couple of strokes off your solution then why not visit our Discord server for some advice."*

item.title: Code Golf Website
item.dc:creator: hostilefork
item.description:
Here's a competitive code golf site with a leaderboard:

https://code.golf/

The site seems to be reasonably well done, puzzles look good:

QR Decoder

It has a different model than other sites, where the answers are secret:

"Can I See Other People's Solutions?

No, that way all holes stay competitive. If you're stuck on how to shave a couple of strokes off your solution then why not visit our Discord server for some advice."

Read full topic
